summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The South Dallas Fair Park Opportunity Fund (SDFPOF) Board will hold a regular meeting on October 28, 2024, at 6:00 P.M. The meeting will take place at 1500 Marilla Street, Room 6ES, and will also be accessible via videoconference. The purpose of the meeting is to discuss updates, review funding proposals, and make decisions regarding community development initiatives.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Introduction of new board members.
2. Approval of minutes from the previous meeting on September 30, 2024.
3. Staff updates, including liaison contacts and February 2024 Notice of Funding Availability (NOFA) awardees.
4. Review and approval of Human Development awards to qualified applicants.

**Important Details**:  
The board will consider awarding up to $35,000 to "For Them" and up to $60,000 to the Dallas Prestige Group as part of the Human Development awards. Additionally, updates will be provided on city funding and approval processes, as well as reports from subcommittees focused on business development and marketing.

**Action Items**:  
The board is seeking approval for the proposed funding awards and will address any public comments related to agenda items 5 through 7. Decisions on these funding allocations and updates from subcommittees will be critical for advancing community development efforts in South Dallas.
